version_description:
The number of wildcards allowed per number pattern has been increased from 6 to 7. Now you can block up to 10,000,000 numbers per pattern. That's a whole area code in the U.S.!

Added the ability to import and export a list of number patterns to o

The total amount of blocked numbers is now shown below the list of number patterns.

Added a maximum number limit of 50,000,000 numbers. (This is due to memory limitations.)

Other bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixed a bug that popped up in the last update that could cause the app to crash when adding a new number pattern.
Fixed an issue where some phone numbers weren't blocked on iPhone 5.

Fixed an issue where numbers might not be blocked after restoring iPhone from an iCloud backup.

Other minor usability improvements.
Minor bug fixes and usability improvements.
Fixed some bugs related to deleting number patterns.
Fixed a crash on iOS 10 when importing number patterns from a text file.

Added a "Share App" button.

Improved handling of a specific type of error that can occur with iPhone's call blocking system.

Added "Allowed Numbers" feature. Add specific numbers or number patterns you don't want block.

New app design with a tabbed interface.

Other bug fixes and enhancements.
Fixed a bug that could prevent the "Block Similar Numbers" share action from adding a number pattern.

Added support for Dark Mode in iOS 13.

Number patterns are now sorted numerically. (This can be changed by tapping “More”, then choosing “Sort Options”.)

Fixed a few minor bugs.
Fixed an error that occurred when attempting to block a number with all zeroes.
Fixed a bug that could cause the app to crash immediately after being opened.
